definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The president gave away prizes at the school sports.
sentences.chinese: 校長在學校運動會上頒發獎品。

sentences.english: We have invited a famous former student to give away the prizes.
sentences.chinese: 我們邀請了一位知名校友來頒發獎品。

sentences.english: Prince Michael of Kent presented the prizes.
sentences.chinese: 肯特親王邁克爾頒發了獎品。

sentences.english: Jihoo is so happy to see Jandi's brilliant smile when she can get the "meat" prize!
sentences.chinese: 智厚很幸福看絲草明朗笑容，她獲得肉獎品的時候。

sentences.english: Assuming, of course, that Roth doesn’t win the prize while hecan still enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 當然，那要假定羅斯未拿到獎品但仍可享有獎項。

sentences.english: The competition and prize of a free car is a sprat to catch a mackerel.
sentences.chinese: 舉辦競賽並開出免費汽車的獎品不過是小釣餌。

sentences.english: Write a letter to Santa and you might win a prize.
sentences.chinese: 給聖誕白叟寫封信，你也許可能得到獎品。

sentences.english: The mayor gave away the prizes at the school sports.
sentences.chinese: 市長在校運會上頒發了獎品。

sentences.english: The loser's scorn for the award is pure sour grape.
sentences.chinese: 失敗者對獎品的輕視純粹是喫不到葡萄說葡萄酸。

sentences.english: The Sino-Canada Program Office will issue the honor certificates to the awardees .
sentences.chinese: 獲獎學生由中加項目辦公室授予榮譽證書及獎品。

sentences.english: The president presented the award to the students in person.
sentences.chinese: 校長親自向學生們頒發了獎品。

sentences.english: The mayor distributed the prizes among the winners.
sentences.chinese: 市長給優勝者頒發獎品。

sentences.english: The judges awarded the prize to her.
Reach for your peak, your goal and you prize.
sentences.chinese: 爲攀登高峯，達到目標，得到獎品而努力。

sentences.english: The headmaster himself will give away the prizes to the students at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 校長將在會上親自給學生頒發獎品。

definition: to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
winner/lucky guy/person who always gets good breaks
money wrapped in red as a gift/bonus payment/kickback/bribe
